---
title: Simple Usage
order: 1
---

本 Demo 演示一行文字的用法。

```jsx
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom';
import ExampleComponent from '@alilc/lowcode-setter-title';

class App extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <div
        style={{
          display: 'flex',
          alignItems: 'center',
          width: 275,
          border: '1px solid darkblue',
        }}
      >
        <ExampleComponent />
      </div>
    );
  }
}

ReactDOM.render(<App />, mountNode);
```
